price: Basi wangeli sema: Macho yetu yamelevywa, bali sisi wenyewe tumerogwa.
arabic: لَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمٞ مَّسۡحُورُونَ
footnotes: Bado wasingeli amini, na wangesema: Macho yetu yamefumbwa tusione, na yamefunikwa. Bali hayo si lolote ila ni uchawi tu, tumerogwa! Basi hapana faida ya ishara yoyote maadamu nyoyo zao zimeenea ukafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laqālū innamā sukkirat abṣārunā bal naḥnu qawmun masḥūrūna
